summary: The video discusses why people are investing in Dubai, highlighting the benefits of buying property there. It states that buyers can live in the property, resell it for profit, rent it out to pay off their payment plan, and obtain a free residency visa. The video also mentions that Dubai is a tax-free city and that prices for a brand new studio start at €120,000, making it affordable for everyone. The creator offers a free consultation and encourages viewers to DM them.
transcript: Why everyone in Dubai, and you're still not when you buy a property in Dubai. You can live in it and later resell for profit, or you can rent it out and pay off your payment plan. And you can also get your free residency visa. And you will be living in a tax-free city. You don't need to be a millionaire. Prices starts from only €120,000 for a brand new studio. Dubai is affordable for everyone. DM me to get your free consultation.
